raw:
{{Infobox item poe2
| name           = Correspondence Between Captains Reiki and Masquoro
| icon           = poe2 note_folded icon.png
| description    = To the Oft-Admired but Questionably Attired Captain Reiki,

This letter should reach the Brass Citadel long before I do. Which is lucky for you, because you'll need the time to make some hazat≈çha winnings to settle our last bet.

Never challenge a captain of the Ruquapa choro kernel spitting contest.

My eldest knitted a pair of those fancy socks you love. Though I hear Deadfire's the kind of place where it's nice to feel the sand between your toes.

Maybe it really is the haven everyone says it is. You'll know before I do.

When you see our sails, have a pair of razor skewers, some arrack, and about thirty palohe nuts of varying sizes ready.

In grand deeds and ill-advised wagers, Captain Masquoro
